description: Try our easy to follow NAN速 Banana Pikelets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: NAN速 Banana Pikelets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour and sugar in a medium bowl; pour in combined egg and NAN速 Toddler milk; fold in banana.
Heat a nonstick frying pan over medium heat; spray with oil; add a tablespoonful of mixture; cook until bubbles appear on the surface; turn over and cook a further 1 minute or until cooked through.

Serve spread with ricotta and honey if desired. Note: Cooking affects certain heat sensitive nutrients in NAN速 Toddler milk, so there may be a reduction in the nutritional value when serving in this way.
